dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a heat map graph
dataJson.name: Visualize Data with a Heat Map
dataJson.story: How glad I am now that I have learned how D3 truly works while working at the previous project or this would have been a mess and a really stressful experience. Instead this felt like a breeze and everything was fitting in nicely. Not much to say except a praise towards D3 that handles big amounts of data with such ease.

techs.description: A programming language used for scripting web browser
techs.name: Javascript

techs.description: A library for visual data representation
techs.name: D3
